sentences.en: A slender forty-nine-year-old with salt-and-pepper hair and a fixed expression, he wore a dark suit with a collarless striped shirt.
sentences.cn: 马沙49岁，身材修长，头发斑白，脸上的表情一成不变。 他穿一套深色西装，里面是一件无领子的条纹T恤。

sentences.en: He sported a collarless jacket with pleated black panels.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件带有黑色褶子饰条的无领上衣。

sentences.en: I need a collarless blouse in light green.
sentences.cn: 我要一件淡绿色的无领衬衫.

sentences.en: Ji Nuo men wear wide trousers and collarless white coat Duijin.
sentences.cn: 基诺族男子穿宽裤,无领对襟白色外衣.

sentences.en: Originally the collarless shirt and trousers were nondescript, of flannel or wool.
sentences.cn: 起初无领的衬衫和长裤是没用固定特征的，或者是法兰绒的或者是羊毛的。

words.tran_cn: 抓住；给…上领子；给…套上颈圈

trans.tran_cn: 无领的，无马轭（或颈圈）的
trans.tran_en: a collarless jacket, shirt etc is one that does not have a collar
